category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_auto_populate_occ_notes
preference.preference_description: Specifies a multivalue property that contains the lists of note types that are prepopulated in the Enter Part Data step of the Add Part to Product wizard or the Replace Part in Product wizard. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. These strings have the following format: Field-1#Field-2#Field-3#Field-4 Field-1 - Specifies the display name of occurrence note types. Field-2 - Specifies whether the value is retrieved from a property on the specified object or is a constant.PROPThe value is retrieved from a property.CONSTThe value is a constant. Field-3 - Specifies the object. If the value of Field-2 is PROP, the valid values of Field-3 are:PRODUCTPRODUCT_REVPARTPART_REVABEABE_REVDEFAULTIf the value of Field-2 is CONST, the valid value of Field-3 is DEFAULT. Field-4 - Specifies the property name or constant value. If the value of Field-2 is PROP, the valid value is the property name of the object specified in Field-3. If the value of Field-2 is CONST, this field contains the value of the constant.
